actions.in_committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation

official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Army, acting through the Chief of Engineers, to improve public access to Pearson-Skubitz Big Hill Lake, Kansas.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Army, acting through the Chief of Engineers, to improve public access to Pearson-Skubitz Big Hill Lake, Kansas, by upgrading existing roads and constructing new roads.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Army, acting through the Chief of Engineers, to improve public access to Pearson-Skubitz Big Hill Lake, Kansas.
